snippet: With factory activity and homebuilder confidence on the rise, economists have high hopes for a strong quarter.
abstract: Federal Reserve reports that industrial production increased 0.6 percent in May as output rose across a swath of industries.
lead_paragraph: With factory activity and homebuilder confidence on the rise, economists have high hopes for a strong quarter.

headline.main: Brighter Economic Outlook as Manufacturing Climbs
headline.print_headline: Brighter Economic Outlook as Manufacturing Climbs
